website_summaries.verdict: The small size of this affordable dryer is perfect to throw in your suitcase or gym bag, but it isn't powerful enough for all types of hair.
pros: Compact, lightweight, and easy to handle
It provides a lot of heat and also has a cool button
cons: It can take longer to dry some types of hair with this one
Some owners report problems with the attachment staying on

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been procrastinating for the longest time to get a get new blow dryer, and I am SO GLAD I found this one. Is it weird to say that this hair dryer is beautiful? It really does have that profession salon look and it works like it too. I have naturally curly hair and always wanted a diffuser and this comes with it! Great price for such a high quality blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Symone

customer_reviews.title: This "low noise" hair dryer is louder than her POS dryer from Walmart 4 years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer for my girlfriend after one too many 5am wake up calls from the decrepit banshee she uses every day. I was woefully mistaken for thinking hair dryers were even capable of being "low noise." Instead of the low lull of a sweet maiden's hair care song, this hair dryer is more like a Slipknot concert about split ends and frizz. I'm exaggerating a little- my girlfriend says that the dryer works fine (she prefers the high setting, much to my dismay.) But spoiler alert- it is NOT quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I got this hair dryer to replace the broken one. This one has so many options and powerful. This one is so powerful and very light weight. My daughter used to don’t like me to help her blow dryer her hair but this one why the light on, she stay and let me do it. Reasonable price highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: yongchaolin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a typical blow dryer! It doesn't dry my hair any faster than any other dryer I've used in the past (not sure why people are saying that?) My hair isn't any shinier or softer than before either! In fact, I have just as much frizz as I did with my cheap dryers! It's not a bad dryer, it's nice and hefty and doesn't feel at all cheap, but as far as any claims to drying your hair faster or making it healthy, I haven't seen that!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Body of the dryer has material that looks high end, not cheap plastic some dryer has.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old Conair hair dryer needs a replacement. I bought this one based on other's recommendations. so far it's been working great. This dryer heats up fast and compare to my Conair dryer, it's not as loud as my Conair, but still powerful. The red light coming from the tube is a cool design, it shows where on the hair you are blowing. Three attachments came in handy to fit diff. hair style. The body of the dryer has material that looks high end, not cheap plastic some dryer has. Overall, a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Laxense

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have slightly thick mid-length hair and normal dry time is 15 minutes.....this product dried my hair in 4 minutes flat. Amazing!!! Great Buy for the Mom on the go.....
customer_reviews.author: Erin Rapoza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to change dryer attachments
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase! I frequently change the end piece, depending on my hair goals! And while the pieces fit snug, I can still change them without any trouble (see video), but they haven’t loosened up and don’t fall off while trying to use! This has been a problem with other hair dryers in the past. The sleek, satin texture is very nice. And the biggest bonus to me, is that the “cool” button is easy to reach, and doesn’t have so much resistance that using it makes my hand tired before I’m done drying my hair. I’ve had this since before Christmas 2018, and am still very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, but with that being said only so ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but with that being said only so many hair dryers for a rv. Does not blow a 30 amp breaker while running ac in rv
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable Difference
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. So far the best blow dryer I've owned. Is it perfect? No. Does it solve all my hair problems? No. But it at least doesn't make them worse. MY FRIZZY, dry, disgusting, fine thin hair has been a lot smoother and less frizzy since using this. I don't think it is faster than other blow dryers I've owned, but it is for sure better. NOTICEABLY better. People have even noticed.
customer_reviews.author: teejay

customer_reviews.title: Powerful hair dryer compared with other well known brands.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit hesitant at first before purchasing this product since my family has always used brand name products. However, after a week using it constantly, it has proved me wrong. This hair dryer is super powerful, if not more powerful then a lot of other professional brands. What I like about it is it has the little light to tell you if it is warm air or cool air. Whenever you press on the cool button, the red LED would turn off. When you turn the temperature to high, it becomes very warm. Pros: cheaper but comparable to brand name dryers. Cons: none that I could think of right now.
customer_reviews.author: Quan Pham

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and slow to heat
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer weighs a lot. Even with my very short hair it was annoyingly too heavy to hoist it long enough to dry my hair. It's also slow to heat up. Used it twice then bought a perfectly nice, light Revlon hair dryer at Target.
customer_reviews.author: EastBayResident

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it. Impossible to hold without pressing all the buttons!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Not very hot and impossible to hold without shutting it off/changing heat settings or pressing “cool” button. I’d like to know how all the other reviewers were holding the dryer in their hands without pressing the buttons. IT’S IMPOSSIBLE, especially because the dryer is so heavy and buttons have bad placement. I’m mad at myself for throwing out the box!
customer_reviews.author: Double R

customer_reviews.title: Good little dryer
customer_reviews.text: I got this dryer because I am a senior lady, and I needed something light-weight to use on my hair. Most dryers are kind of heavy. This one is very light, so it meets that need. I also like the fact that it doesn't scream like some small hair dryers do- the sound level is fine. It would be nice if it had a removable screen at the intake point to make it easy to clean, but it doesn't have that. It doesn't move as much air as a full size dryer, but it does the job fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Papmom

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my first hair dryer and I really like it. It has different settings and different speeds, so you can set it in the way you want it. Since I have short hairs, it dries my hairs in like 2 minutes or something. It looks pretty good, not like those cheap hair dryers. I don’t feel like it’s heavy like many people dat it is, but well, I’m a guy so I guess it could be heavy for a female. Anyway, I would definitely recommend this hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Mony 007

customer_reviews.title: Teenager Approved
customer_reviews.text: This brand of blow dryers is our new household favorite. I purchased this one for my 16yr old daughter. She has long hair and it takes her more than 30 minutes to blow dry. I was hoping the ‘comb’ attachment would help with the snarls and it does. She really likes the different heat levels of the blow dryer. She uses the comb attachment for almost the entire time she dries her hair and it cuts down on all the hair knots. She also mentioned to me that she likes the velcro that keeps the cord from getting tangled when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Carole MC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: This blow dryer is amazing! I have super thin, frizzy hair. It definitely helps with the frizz and makes my hair really soft. I usually use it on medium heat. It dries my hair thoroughly, but doesn't get super hot. I also love that it comes with a diffuser because I have wavy hair. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Nara

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it ... and then it died
customer_reviews.text: It claimed to be quiet (A/C Motor, etc.). It wasn't. The shape of the handle was such that I couldn't get a good grip and it tended to slip. the switches got in the way of holding it. The red light was distracting, creating shadows where I'm trying to see my hair while drying. And then it sparked & died. Tried to contact the manufacture ... no response. Replaced it with another brand from a local store, which is quieter, easier to hold, and has no (stupid) red light. Makes me wonder whether all the positive reviews are created by a Bot?
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Almost lasted 2 years - sparks & smoke!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in September 2018. Worked great for almost two years with only minor cosmetic wear to the unit. Very powerful and adjustable. July 2020 and I turned it on and sparks and smoke come spewing out of the unit. Its dead. I tried reaching out to the seller because the listing advertised a “two year warranty” however their amazon sellers email address did not work through the amazon app and it bounced back undeliverable. Shady. For these reasons I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: William S

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair drier
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous black velvety rubber hairdryer with infrared ion generator that smooth your hair and leave it shining, yes I can tell that because I had my client to try it. It dries your dump hair super fast, it very well equipped with a diffuser and a comb to style your hair while drying it. It is fantastic, I am in love with this product. It arrived well packed the company took good care of items and client. ships fast and delivery is fast too. more on video.
customer_reviews.author: Mariane G. Tec

customer_reviews.title: The Best hair dryer Ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my gf Christmas gift . It looks cool and gets the job done. It's lightweight and works fantastically. This hair dryer cut my girlfriend's drying time in half and leaves her hair soft and shiny. The customized black box makes it perfect for Gift . Highly recomend !
customer_reviews.author: Vick

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost for a travel dryer
customer_reviews.text: Compared with my regular-size dryer that I bought locally, the JINRI is about half the size, half as loud, and half as hot. The JINRI dries my shoulder-length hair in 9.5 minutes, while the regular-size dryer does the job in 8 minutes. The JINRI has a cold shot button, just as my regular-size does. I prefer the JINRI for travel and the other one for daily use. Overall, the purchase was worth it, because this dryer does the job and takes up less space in my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: jdragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Pleased and Happy
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful little hair dryer perfect for my purposes. It is small, lightweight and easily used. My only issue with it is that the flow nozzle frequently blows off on high setting. Not a big problem for me, since I seldom use the high heat setting, but worth noting for others. I ordered this small-sized dryer for travel, and it works perfectly for that purpose, taking up little space in a travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: James Milson

customer_reviews.title: Saves time, makes hair shine and smooth. Love the attachments
customer_reviews.text: The hair dryer that I've been using for the last 18 years finally gave out on me leading me to purchase this one. I love this blow dryer! Reduces the time it takes to dry my hair, helps my hair to be silky smooth with a shine. The cord is a good length so I'm not attached to the wall. It has a velcro strap around the cord so it can be easily wrapped up and put away. Comes with 3 handy attachments. One helps to give my roots and hair a lift, one helps straighten my hair and the other one is great for curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Brielle

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Curly Hair!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is amazing. I have naturally curly, fine hair, which is prone to frizz. I live in a very humid state and must either resort to using lots of product to TRY to control frizz or accept looking like a well-used q-tip all summer long. To test if this dryer really does what it claims, I only used leave-in conditioner - not a drop of frizz-control product. My hair dried three times faster, my curls look fantastic, my hair is smooth, soft and shiny, and NO FRIZZ!!!!! Without product! I wish I had found this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it's so light. I have arthritis and a heavier hair dryer is difficult to hold up for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Small size, light blow
customer_reviews.text: I like how light and small this is but it lacks power. It takes 2x as long as it normally would to dry my hair. I’m keeping it because it is light enough to live in my carry-on without notice, but you either pay for size or pay for power. The nozzle doesn’t stay on good if you like the directed flow, I’m considering taping it on.
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: High heat setting was barely warm...med and low heat setting was colder then the cold shot button. I have thin hair and took 10 minutes to dry my hair. Returning. DO NOT BUY...
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: So nice, I bought it twice !
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BLOW-DRYER! I'm not all that skilled when it comes to styling my hair, but this dryer and these attachments make it way too easy. As one with long and very thick hair, I seldom used my old blow-dryer (due to how much time it took). When it died, this was my replacement..holy crap am I satisfied with this purchase. My hair takes virtually no time to dry with this. The infrared feature is great too - my hair is far less frizzy and very soft afterwards. I mentioned to my mother how much I love this. She immediately requested I ordered another one, and she loves it just as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: No staying power
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer 8 months ago and the motor is dying.( I have fine, thin hair, so this is hardly a drain on the product.) It has to be on for several minutes to even get to a point where it's usable at all, and then only for a short time. Worst part is this model is no longer offered, and the seller didn't offer a guarantee. The manufacturer does offer a 1 yr. warranty, but after paying for S&H, as well as the S&H for return to me, I might as well just buy a new dryer. I can tell you that when I do, it won't be this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: lec

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working properly after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved everything about this dryer . It worked great and felt great, really seemed like a well made product until month 4... the low setting completely stopped working, the high setting is mega fast now it's almost scary. I decided to reset it several times and gave it a go again a couple days later. Now the low setting only blows high and the high setting blows high...after a minute it completely shut off on its own..(probably a good thing) Overall I don't use this item very often so this shouldn't be happening. They also won't issue me a refund or replacement. Put your dollars elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dryer has it all.
customer_reviews.text: This blow dryer is amazing. Not only does it have every temperature you need it has every attachment and speed. The speeds with the temperature selection keeps the hair from burning, while giving maximum drying capacity. The diffuser for the hair is so big with pieces for lifting that it’s dried in half the time. And it has the standard attachments to zoom in as well.
customer_reviews.author: The real Nickie Penn

customer_reviews.title: Seemed counterfeit...
customer_reviews.text: I never used it on my hair. As soon as I saw the box and felt how heavy the dryer was something seemed off. I turned it on and it was so loud! After looking the brand up online and comparing what I bought to what they sold on their site... my conclusion was that I had received some sort of knock-off. Immediately returned.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely hate this hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate this hair dryer. It's very heavy and for the weight of it you would think the fan would blow better...it doesn't. The control buttons are inside the handle so you're constantly turning it off while trying to hold this albatross and dry your hair. My hair is fine and right to my chin line but it still takes almost 15 minutes to dry my hair. If my husband hadn't thrown out the box I would have sent this thing back. VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birthday present.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a regular hair dryer user but my roommate is. So I bought this dryer for her as her Birthday gift and I think I made the right choice. She is very happy with the dryer and the extra extensions that came with it. It also comes with a 'cool' air blow option which is really cool. It has a long cord which makes it helpful to use in the bathroom as well. She mentions that using the diffuser is very nice as it dries off the hairs quickly. So I would say that its a nice present to give or to use it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Arth

customer_reviews.title: Most professional negative ion hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is the most professional negative ion hair dryer that I had. It is powerful, which makes drying hair much faster than ever. It has three different nozzles which make my fuzzy hair more easy-care and stylish. I definitely love this lightweight hair dryer and want to recommend it to others who want a professional hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Quality excellent. Mutual functions! Price is good
customer_reviews.text: It’s provide various head depends on your hair’s length. The coating is comfortable easy to grab. As you can see the quality assurance which has ETL certificate. Multi function can alter the temperature and the air strength so you won’t damage your hairs. It’s worth it to get one if you don’t have a hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: HongDing

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference this blower makes. I have very thin, permed hair. Even with a perm it was very labor intensive. The curl and life is back in my hair. It not only looks curlier and fuller, but the style stays for days......like when the stylist blows it out. Very reasonably priced, for how it performs. I bought it after reading the good and bad reviews and, although I do agree with some of the bad reviews, I am so glad that I bought it. I particularly picked it out based on having curly hair; not sure how it would work for straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G

customer_reviews.title: box doesn't mention ionic or ceramic anywhere
customer_reviews.text: No idea if this is actually ionic or ceramic because neither are mentioned anywhere on the box. It's Nothng special. Doesn't dry my Har any faster than my old, 4lb hairdryer from the early 2000s. There are only 2 SPEED settings, high and low, and a cold shot button that doesn't get very cold. This product is probably worth about $15.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Good hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I buy this hair dryer for my home and I am so impressed about it. it cut down my time to make my hair drying. with 3 setting temperature, you can control the temperature and no more worry burn your hair. Also the cool setting is so good too. very light weight and so quite. however, come with 3 different diffuser, you have more choice to blow your hair
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyVu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet compared to normal hair dryers. Works perfect for me. Short hair on sides and rest of hair about 4-5 inches long. Drys quick, not too hot and 'cool' button a great addition and dryer fit in my small bathroom drawer. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurent Jacquemin

customer_reviews.title: At first look seem good, let's wait son 3 month and we'll  talk again .
customer_reviews.text: Today arrive the product, the first look it's impressive, the black mate color is elegant and the contact with the product, in my hand looks durable and comfortable, this is a gift for my wife and daughter, I'm metallurgical engineer and my knowledge and experience it's related with the control of quality, and this product looks like that, durable and realible. It compact but a little heavy, so in a long period of work maybe it can make the arm field tired
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Arango

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Dries hair fast!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research to find an affordable hair dryer that still gives results- This is it! Though slightly heavy to hold, this dryer works quickly and effectively for smooth hair in minutes. It is infinitely better than the drugstore dryers I've used recently (Conair and Revlon), but not as strong of air flow as Babyliss. However, especially for the price, I would definitely recommend this product and would repurchase if it lasts a year or longer. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this October 2018. It just started shooting fire today. Worked well until now. I believe if you take card of your hair dryers they should last longer than 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: C. Irving

customer_reviews.title: Professional Grade
customer_reviews.text: Best hairdryer I’ve ever owned. Full disclosure, I’m a man, however i have always used a hair dryer. This dryer is totally professional grade and super powerful. I love the infrared and ion technology, even the matte finish has a supple and pleasant texture to it. I have had it for about two months now and am happy everytime i use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Bohlmann

customer_reviews.title: Best hair dryer I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The cool function is awesome, there's also a cool shot button for finishing up a design or reducing frizz. It's easy to clean the dust from the filter and I've only had to clean it once in almost the 2 years I've owned it. Granted I didn't use it every day but I've started to use it more often since getting the hang of how to dry & style my hair at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Alys

customer_reviews.title: Mini Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This little hair dryer is perfect for our RV. I have short, fine hair and have no problem getting it dry. The dryer is small and doesn't take up much space plus I wanted a low wattage so not to have problems with too many electrical things running in the RV.
customer_reviews.author: jol

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good hair dryer for the price . Would buy it again in a minute. I have fine and quite thin hair, but some natural wave and am able to adjust heat and speed for my type. Best dryer I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Powerful hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and feel of this hair dryer. I purchased this one because it had both low and high settings for heat and fan speed. The low setting for the fan speed is really strong and makes it hard to style as you dry. My hair is blowing out of my brush as I’m trying to style it - that is the reason for my four star rating.
customer_reviews.author: FLMom

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy; too loud
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this blow dryer, but returned since it was way too loud and too heavy/bulky for my hands. It dried well, and I kept trying to use it thinking I'd get used to it, but it was just too cumbersome and my ears weren't happy. My little $10 blow dryer is much more quiet and easier to handle so I guess I'll have to hope it continues to work.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer. I was looking to replace a cheap one that lasted through my adolescence and college years. I wanted to buy a higher quality dryer without breaking the bank too much. This has been perfect. It dries my hair quickly and it leaves it soft and smooth. My previous dryer's diffuser would fall off easily, but this one as stayed in place nicely. It's such a nice improvement from my last hair dryer!
customer_reviews.author: NAD

customer_reviews.title: Great airflow strength
customer_reviews.text: This has great airflow options, it blows stronger than my $150 hairdryer, I don’t even use it anymore. Also 3 heating options and the size is great I can even take it for travel
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Silky
customer_reviews.text: Overall I liked it. It has different temperatures and speed settings. I have super thick hair and never had a problem with too much heat, but this would be a great buy if you hair damages easily with heat. Great price range for the quality that it is.My hair normally takes forever to dry, but not with this dryer. It drys so quickly. I can feel smooth and silky hair.Using concentrator and diffuser I can style my hair as I like and finishes with cool dry. Really like this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Chandini

customer_reviews.title: Not the good product!
customer_reviews.text: This item sometimes working well and sometimes not! after about two weeks....! I usually use only cool on my hair and there is no cool with this dryer. I will be returning this dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Very good hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hair dryer but it's very heavy so if you have any arm or shoulder issues this is not for you. I have a torn shoulder and have to take breaks in drying my hair. If you don't have an issue you will like...It does a great job on my curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is really good and take much less time to dry my hair than the old one that I had even though I used it mostly on the medium not the high. Also, I liked the parts that come with it and the fact that the cord is long enough to have more flexibility. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ZA

customer_reviews.title: Not dual voltage
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for a trip to France and Spain. I have the large size of this brand I’ve enjoyed which is why I bought this. I assumed it was dual voltage and while packing for the trip noticed it isn’t. I had to leave it home and take my old standby.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good product with some CONs
customer_reviews.text: Pro. Long cord, drys fast, cool button, has held up for a year and still working. Con. The flow price at the end of the blow dryer quickly broke in the beginning and now it won’t stay in place. I would like to get a few of them so that when they break I can replace them.
customer_reviews.author: balley49

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dryer.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this dryer!! It dries very well and pretty quick without having to use the high heat. I live the red light as well. The attachments are a lil tricky putting on and taking off. I didn't want to break them so I carefully lifted them to pip them off. Also, the dryer has multiple settings that help for drying all hair textures. I am VERY satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MzSnackz

customer_reviews.title: Good product but heavier than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: The dryer is comfortable to hold, but a lot heavier than I expected. It did take longer than my current hair dryer to complete, but that could be because it doesn't allow the air to get too hot, which is better for your hair. In all, it is a good product, but it is heavier and takes a little longer than others. My hair had a nice shine after and I barely had to touch the ends with my straightener to style them, which is a positive
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great For Curly Hair
customer_reviews.text: I needed an ionic dryer with a good diffuser so I didn’t ruin my locks. Cool setting works amazingly after using curling products. High heat is good if you’re in a rush, but not generally recommended for curls like mine. Researched many dryers and this came up on multiple sites. easy to use. Good quality. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little dryer! I did not expect much from its size, but needed something for a last minute trip. Wow, was I surprised! Packs a lot of heat, but love the cool function. This may actually replace my big drier too- its light weight so my arm doesn't get tired.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: amazing hair dryer for the price
customer_reviews.text: amazing hair dryer for the price!!! but the nozzle does not stay on. and I my cool setting doesn't work... but i don't really use the cool setting so it's fine. If you need a dryer with a good cool air setting than get something else. It's small and cute and great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Anika Tabassum

customer_reviews.title: Product did not last
customer_reviews.text: Barely had this for three weeks and it stopped working on low power. Handle got super hot and it finally just went out. So disappointing! Drying power was awesome while it worked. I would not consider this dryer as a quiet dryer onless it was on low but the low power only worked for a week then the dryer had only one speed. I have had my other dryer forever and was wanting something more quiet and efficient. This dryer did not even last a month. I gave it one star since it no longer works. Wish i had the box so i could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All in 1 hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer heats up quickly. It has two speeds, high and low. There are 3 heat settings, cool, warm and hot, which I find helps with styling. It comes with 3 attachments, which I use to straighten my hair or I use the diffuser to curl my hair. I really like that it has a removable air filter, which makes it easy to clean. It has a long cord, but comes with a cord wrap, which makes it easy to store. I normally wouldn't pay this much for a hair dryer, but this one is worth it. I highly recommend this hair dryer!Also, when that is pushed, the red color disappears. All in all I like this hair dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Connie W

customer_reviews.title: Great Blow-dryer. Cuts drying time dramatically.
customer_reviews.text: Great product across the board. I've only used it once but it was a really positive experience. My hair does not straighten easily... Normally. This dryer worked in record time. Fast delivery. I am so very excited to have this tool handy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Damaged my Hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm comparing this to my seven year old Revlon dryer that I was replacing. I've now gone back to my old one and am returning this. I'd hoped to decrease drying time, which didn't happen. What did happen is my hand got more tired as this is a lot heavier AND I had to cut parts of my hair off when they got sucked into the back (something my other dryer doesn't do). This product didn't impress me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but just stopped turning on and just over 1 month old. Now can't return. Total waste on money. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair a little frizzy so far.
customer_reviews.text: Dries fast but made my hair a little frizzy. Still debating on sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Extremely powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to buy this blow dryer because i had never heard of the brand but my chi blewup and i couldn't afford to replace it with the same one so i bought this one and i do not regret it. It is so powerful it cut my dry time in half. I really lile the straight comb attachment not a lot of dryers have this, it cuts down on the frizzyness.
customer_reviews.author: Nina S.

customer_reviews.title: Heat Warped
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in May and the hair dryer still works perfect! Dries my hair quickly and overall silent compared to others I've used in the past. However, I'm extremely disappointed in the attachments. I bought with the specific intention of using the diffuser. After using it a few times and on LOW heat the diffuser and the concentrator have melted and warped right where they connect to the dryer just enough that they no longer stay secured. I cannot use the dryer and diffuser without it continuously falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine D

customer_reviews.title: Love this blow dyer
customer_reviews.text: This is the first professional salon grade blow Dyer I ever purchased, but such a difference in my hair. It comes out looking shiney and no frizz. I would highly recommend buying. I did wait almost 8 months and then grab it on a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Very good hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a hair dryer and came across this product. Very nice built. It is good size strong air and low noise. Usually with powerful hair dryer, it would be loud but this one has pretty good low noise. The low noise does not take away the powerful air .my wife she loves it !
customer_reviews.author: vitalijus zonys

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful great job .
customer_reviews.text: Omg my daughter will love this !!! THIS hair dryer has such good heat and power. It also , has several attachments so you can do diferent styles. I bought this for my daughter but I might just have to keep it .
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend !!
customer_reviews.text: Great product !! Bought this for my grand daughter for Christmas, and one just like it last year for my daughter at Christmas !! Two times !! Great power and really puts out the air and easy to use for drying your hair after a shower !!
customer_reviews.author: Tn. freightshaker

customer_reviews.title: It does what a dryer should do.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a hair dryer. There’s nothing more or less special about it. It is not quiet. When compared to my less expensive dryer that recently stopped working, I’d say it’s equivalent in noise level. It may dry my hair a bit quicker. I’m satisfied but not overjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Laurich

customer_reviews.title: salon quality dryer
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for good quality hair dryer with a reasonable price... and bought this product by reading its reviews given by other reviewers which was really helpful... drying time and voice is less as compared to my old hair dryer... i showed it to my daughter who got her own salon and for few days she took it to her salon and used it on her customer and according to her it is salon level quality..
customer_reviews.author: kamna beri

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hairdryer! It's tinier than it looks in the picture, but it does the trick. I didn't read the 'mini' description on the name first, but I wasn't disappointed at all. Perfect for a hairdryer to bring with you on vacations. Packaging was perfectly in tact. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Because I didn’t want to pack my expensive hair dryer in my suitcase, I purchased this affordable and compact hair dryer and it’s perfect for travel. However, it’s not as lightweight as I thought and every pound counts toward luggage limit. It’s powerful enough for all hair types of hair. It provides a lot of heat and I like that it has a cool button. Received fast shipping from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: sophisticated and useful
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this hair dryer for a month now. It has been very helpful to me and my hair. I have dry hair with good volume. I worried before using it that it might add more volume to my hair. But it turned out to be very useful. It dries my hair in very less time and does not add additional volume to my hair. I generally use in LOW. It has a good sophisticated look and is very easy to use. It also provides some additional features for hair different hair style and user convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Shah

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I love this blowdryer! used so fast and it works amazing. Made my hair super soft . this is my new favorite hairdryer it’s great!! Looks so beautiful.It's the perfect size, making it comfortable to hold. And it's powerful, so I spend less time drying my hair. I would very recommend this hairdryer!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality hair dryer! Has three attachments for different hair types and styles! Light weight and easy to use! Would definitely recommend this hair dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Smoked the minute i turned it on!!!
customer_reviews.text: This dryer started smoking the first 10 seconds i turned it on to test it!! If i had left it on any longer, i guarantee you it could’ve potentially caught on fire like i’ve seen in a viral video before. The heat coming out wasn’t hot enough for me to be concerned of it smoking, but I smelled some burning and within seconds it started to smoke fairly heavily so I turned it off and put it back in its box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, lightweight, quieter than most. I don't think the lower speed is lower heat. The cool button works well. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Historken

customer_reviews.title: it made a funny noise and ending up on fire
customer_reviews.text: First time we plugged it in. it made a funny noise and ending up on fire. It was a Christmas gift that I ordered in October. So I can not send it back and now I have to go buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned for 10 months.I like the drying power in this dryer. Is heavier to hold up. Today it sparked inside, smoke appeared, handle immediately got VERY hot, and the OFF button stopped working. Immediately unplugged from the wall and threw away. Disappointed that this didn’t last longer as I only use it twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This product is not a good buy. You're more likely to get the same amount of heat out of this machine as you would from your drunk uncle breathing on you. My previous mini-dryer which I've had for over 5 years outperforms this one. Very disappointing. Will be returning it very soon.
customer_reviews.author: DolFan23

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hair dryer that really cuts the drying time.
customer_reviews.text: This hairdryer had so much power. It dried my hair so much faster then my old one. I feel like it was a little loud but the noise is worth cutting down the dry time. I love the different attachments that come with it. I use the defuser all the time. It's nice to have the multiple temperature settings. The only thing I find weird is that off is in the middle. That always messes me up lol. Overall a great investment and the red infrared light while drying your hair is pretty interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ann

customer_reviews.title: I had been wanting a better hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting a better hair dryer. I have wavy frizzy hair when I do not straighten it. I decided to purchase this hair dryer hoping that it would help with the frizziness. It has definitely helped and I am in love with this hair dryer. Most times after blow drying my hair with this one I am able to go without straightening my hair. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tesia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Easy to Hold & Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer looks and functions very professionally. * I noticed just after the first use that my hair looked like it had more volume and less frizz. * The extra long cord makes it really easy to plug in and have enough slack to stand comfortably near a mirror. * It came with accessories like a diffuser and a comb attachment to help you dry your hair straight. * It also has a built in hook that allows you to hang it on the inside of your cabinet door. * I’m very impressed with this hair dryer and would recommend it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an alternative to the premium Dyson. But, I’m happy with how fast it drys and leaves my hair less frizzy as a standard blow dryer. It is hard to remove the attachments though.
customer_reviews.author: Pam D Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Very light but not that powerful
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light hairdryer and this is very light to hold. However, it is not that powerful and takes longer to dry hair than the norm. However, it is small and is perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Dryer EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Hair dryer I’ve ever used! The defuser works so good, snaps on and off with ease. I’ve already recommended to my friends, thank you for making such a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Hope R. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This dryer worked fine while it worked. After 6 months the low air setting stopped working. Only blows on high now on either setting, so can't use the diffuser because airflow is too strong. Disappointed because I took a chance on this dryer, given the varied reviews, and lost out like many others.
customer_reviews.author: thedaisyflowers

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Smelt like burning plastic. Made an awful grinding noise and had a red metal pice upon the first you. A total waste of money and time. Wish I would’ve believed the reviews. Hazardous
customer_reviews.author: hulagirl1017

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for Christmas because of the diffuser ( she has very curly hair). She hasn't used it much, but I had to the other day because my old hair dryer was on the fritz. I can't tell you how much I loved it! It dries my hair so much faster than my old one and without the heat of it. I was so impressed that I logged on here to buy myself one. My hair is thick but straight as a board and it was dry in less than ten minutes. This will save me so much time in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Good hair dryer while it lasted, which was less than 6 months. It was definitely not over used or abused. Tried to contact seller and received a response that "the sellers email delivery system has a problem, unable to send email to recipient."
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Watkins

customer_reviews.title: great dryer
customer_reviews.text: My hair dryer just blew out after ten great years. Sooo I ordered this beauty with all the bells and whistles. I love this new dryer it has different settings and a swivel cord which is great. It drys my hair fast and is a great dryer esp for the price. I am very impressed with this dryer and if your in the market this is a great one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Keppol

customer_reviews.title: Drys hair quickly !!
customer_reviews.text: This blow dryer is fantastic! I had a Chi dryer before and it lasted me forever and finally stopped working. I ordered this to replace it after my sister telling me about it! It honestly works just as good as the Chi and is 1/3 of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Shirey

customer_reviews.title: All the necessary accessories- great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic hair dryer! I am impressed with its construction! Easy to hold and has amazing power. I have medium length hair and am very happy with it! It is fairly compact and a great price! Has all the necessary accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Always a Mom

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but good
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exactly as pictured. Very happy with it. A lot smaller than I expected but still a Great buy for someone with fine hair like me.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

product_meta.title: JINRI Hair Dryer Infrared Sterilization Professional Salon Ionic Sterilization Hair Dryer With Diffuser & Concentrator Attachments for Curly Hair, Black
product_meta.description:
Size:X-LargeJINRI 1875W Professional Tourmaline Ceramic Negative Ionic Hair Dryer with AC Motor 2 Speed 3 Heat Cold Shot Button, Black

✔ Latest tourmaline ceramic and infrared technology features an ideal way to protect your hair,
reduces static and frizz for healthy-looking hair. 

✔ 2 speeds and 3 heat settings for styling your hair more easily. Cool shot button releases cool air to shape your style. 

✔ Professional 1875 watts long-life AC motor, quick dry your hair within 5 minutes while ceramic and infrared technology effectively protect your hair texture.

✔ Hanging loop guard and removeable filter cap for convenient storage and clean, 100 -120v,60Hz US plug, 9ft power cord.

✔ Lightweight body and ergonomic handle are designed to give you the ultimate professional hair dryer.

Package Included:
1*1875W Powerful Hair Dryer(Black) 
1*Concentrator nozzle
1*Diffuser for curly hair
1*Instruction
1*Original Box

We provide 1-year replacement & 2-year warranty and we commit to offer customers quality products and responsible after-sales service, if you have any problem or question, please contact us by vavusa@yahoo.com.
feature_bullets: 5-Minutes Quick Dry: 1875W salon-perfermance AC motor dries your hair 45% faster comparing to other hair dryers with up to 3x longer life, less drying time, longer lasting life.

Anti-frizz Infrared & Negative Ion: Jinri 1875W ceramic dryers emit non-damaging infrared heat gently for added heat protection to reduce up to 60% less frizz, while the ionic technology dry your hair much faster and styling for smooth, silky hair.
3 Heats/2 Speeds setting/Cool Shot Button for flexible heat and air flow, drying for different hair textures and styling locked by Cold Shot Button.
Concentrator and Diffuser Included: Use diffuser to lift the curly and wavy hair and prevent your hair being tangled, frizzy and unmanageable, the concentrator for smooth and shiny styles.
ETL and ALCI certificated 9ft/2.63m power cord with hanging loop, removable filter for easy cleaning.
